data.message: We believe the link you are trying to visit is malicious. For your safety, we have blocked it.    PLEASE STOP BLOCKING MY SITE

replies.message: Hi Ballzd. If you're having problems with your link, it could be because your website has coding errors that need to be fixed or it's received excessive abuse reports. You can run your website through the Facebook Debugger by following this link: http://bit.ly/2em4ApL. Once you've done so, you can reach out to our Facebook Developers in order to make sure your website is compliant: http://bit.ly/2xAEg3H. You'll need to click "Go to Direct Support" and follow the instructions to open a support ticket. If you're unable to see this option, you can contact your web developer for support in making changes to your website's source code. -Ashley
